Name: NSF Research Experience for Undergraduates Student Mentor

Name: Cultural Computing Research Area
Description: Member of the Cultural Computing Research Area at LSU CCT, contributing to interdisciplinary research initiatives combining culture and computing.

Name: Media Research Studio

Name: Digital Media Research Studio Construction and Equipment
